![](https://i.imgur.com/GlzE7vM.png)

**Arch Hosting** - [https://archhosting.net](https://archhosting.net)

**Promo: Use the code LET10 for 10% off any shared hosting or VPS order for life!**

Arch Hosting is proud to offer high quality virtual servers at an affordable price. When we created our virtual server platform, we had three core goals in mind: speed, reliability, and affordability. The end result was a powerful platform at a very low cost to the consumer - you.

Our infrastructure consists of reliable dedicated servers colocated with CentriLogic for our eastern US locations and QuadraNet for our western US locations. We take pride in our work, and every part of our infrastructure was built with performance and reliability in mind. We currently have a limited stock, so don’t delay!

**Why Arch Hosting?**

- Speedy & Helpful Support - But don't take our word for it, check out our [reviews](https://www.facebook.com/ArchHosting/reviews)!
- 3 Day Money Back Guarantee - No questions asked
- 99.99% Uptime - And an SLA to guarantee it
- 1 Gbps Network - Check our [about page](https://archhosting.net/about) for datacenter peering info
- Powerful hardware - Blazing fast, revolutionary, and buzzword-filled infrastructure for your next project!
- Legal US business - Registered, colocated, and developed in Los Angeles
- 2 Years+ - We've been providing reliable hosting services since 2015
- IPv6 Ready - Future-proof your business

**Web Hosting**

Arch Hosting offers an affordable and powerful platform to launch your website. Our Web Hosting packages come with everything you'll need to get started with your website - the dedicated infrastructure offers the fastest possible connection while still providing the reliability and redundancy that your business needs.

> **Startup Web Hosting**
> 
> - 2 GB SSD Storage
> - 500 GB Premium Bandwidth
> - 1 Hosted Domain
> - **$3/m (Or $9.99/yr) [[Order]](https://archhosting.net/website-hosting)**

> **Business Web Hosting**
>
> - 10 GB SSD Storage
> - 1 TB Premium Bandwidth
> - 4 Hosted Domains
> - **$6/m (Or $14.99/yr) [[Order]](https://archhosting.net/website-hosting)**

**Web Hosting Features**

It's cookie-cutter, but it's fast and reliable. The same cPanel software you're used to, with an expert support team standing by to take your questions and a great infrastructure to power your website. If you're not satisfied, you get your money back.

- In-house support with real humans who will actually address your issues
- Free cPanel->cPanel migrations
- Perl, Ruby, Python, Git, & SSH Supported
- Full IPv6 Support
- Free SSL certificates on all domains
- Pure SSD servers
- Free daily backups
- Cloudflare's Railgun to accelerate dynamic content, for free
- Softaculous Script Installer
- DDoS Protection & Mitigation
- Latest software - PHP 7.1, WHM 68, Cloudlinux 7, MariaDB 10.1
- Dedicated IPs available


**Contact Us**

Have a question? We’re standing by to take your inquiries!
